title: Double Champ Purchase
body:
Once I tried to buy a glyph after purchasing Morgana, my IP went down again and I couldn't buy it, after checking my purchase history it seems like my purchase of the glyph was somehow replaced by a second Morgana.

Any refunding/bugfixing would be much appreciated.

replies.body: No worries! It's pretty rare for this type of store issue to come up, but I was able to see that Morgana was purchased twice so I've added the IP back to your account. If you haven't yet, refresh your client and you should see that IP hop back up ^_^!
Cheers, that was quick. Thanks a lot!
